mapper.select: SELECT A.pst_no ,A.user_id ,A.co_id ,A.delr_nm ,A.mdfr_nm ,A.pst_hd ,A.pst_ttl ,A.pst_cn ,A.reg_dt ,A.mdfcn_dt ,A.inq_cnt ,A.bbs_clsf ,A.temp_yn ,A.del_yn ,A.del_dt ,B.user_nm FROM bbs A INNER JOIN USERS B ON A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.BBS_CLSF = 'BB003' AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY PST_NO DESC

SELECT A.pst_no , A.user_id , A.co_id , A.delr_nm , A.mdfr_nm , A.pst_hd , F.CST_CD_NM AS header_as_kor , A.pst_ttl , A.pst_cn , A.reg_dt , A.mdfcn_dt , A.inq_cnt , A.bbs_clsf , A.temp_yn , A.del_yn , A.del_dt , B.bbs_fl_no , B.file_nm , B.file_uuid , B.file_path , B.file_extn , B.file_size , B.pst_no , C.user_nm , D.JBGD_CD , E.CST_CD_NM AS CST_CD_NM , B.FILE_EXIST
FROM BBS A
LEFT JOIN BBS_ATCH B ON A.pst_no = B.pst_no
INNER JOIN USERS C ON A.USER_ID = C.USER_ID
INNER JOIN EMP_INFO D ON A.USER_ID = D.USER_ID
INNER JOIN CUSTOME_CODE E ON D.JBGD_CD = E.CST_CD
INNER JOIN CUSTOME_CODE F ON A.PST_HD = F.CST_CD
WHERE A.pst_no = #{pstNo}
SELECT CST_CD, CO_ID, GR_CD, CST_CD_NM, USER_ID, REG_DT, USE_YN FROM CUSTOME_CODE WHERE GR_CD = #{grCd}
mapper.update: update bbs set INQ_CNT = INQ_CNT + 1 where pst_no = #{pstNo}
mapper.select: SELECT A.cmnt_no , A.pst_no , A.user_id , B.USER_NM , A.cmnt_cn , A.reg_dt , A.mdfcn_dt , A.del_dt , A.delr_nm , A.up_cmnt_no , A.cmnt_lv FROM (SELECT * FROM cmnt START WITH cmnt_lv = 0 CONNECT BY PRIOR CMNT_NO = UP_CMNT_NO) A INNER JOIN users B ON A.user_id = B.user_id WHERE A.PST_NO = #{pstNo}
